data.eml:eml: Alobevania, a new genus of neotropical ensign wasps (Hymenoptera: Evaniidae), with three new species: integrating taxonomy with the World Wide Web

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deans, Andrew R., Kawada, Ricardo (2008): Alobevania, a new genus of neotropical ensign wasps (Hymenoptera: Evaniidae), with three new species: integrating taxonomy with the World Wide Web. Zootaxa 1787: 28-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182491
